name: Middle/Senior Python Developer for AlmaLinux [Remote]
description:
CloudLinux, the worldwide leader in the development of the Linux operating system for web hostings, with a large number of customers all around the world, is looking for a Middle/Senior Python Developer to join our talented Build System team.

As part of our team, you will develop open-source infrastructure projects as Build an automation system and Test system for AlmaLinux. AlmaLinux is a free Linux OS for the community, developed in close co-operation with the community.
Become part of the team of experts and work with top-notch developers to contribute to open source.

Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, so you can plan your day and work from anywhere in the world.

We are a company, who has been working remotely for 6 years, and we know how to do it right.

You can find more details about the company on our website Cloudlinux.com.

Join us to make a difference!

Requirements:

  • 4+ years of Python programming experience.
  • GNU/Linux operating system and shell scripting experience.
  • Experience with git-based development processes.
  • Knowledge of RPM/DEB packages building systems (mock, pbuilder, etc.) will be a plus.
  • Experience with AWS (S3, EC2) will be a huge plus.
  • Experience with Terraform, Ansible and/or other infrastructure management tools will be a plus.
  • Intermediate level of Russian and English languages

Technology stack:

  • Python 3
  • MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQLAlchemy
  • FastAPI, Celery
  • VueJS, Quasar framework

What you will do:

  • You will be involved in the design of the new Build automation system and other open source projects.
  • You will also work on other open-source projects that are part of the ecosystem: Pulp, Pagure, Mock, Ansible, etc.
  • You will be an active member of the AlmaLinux community.

What’s in it for you?

  • A great opportunity for professional development within the young and fast-growing company
  • Interesting and challenging projects
  • Knowledge-Exchange
  • Remote work with long-term employment on a full-time basis under contract
  • High-level compensation based on the performance reviews
  • Compensation in the US dollars
  • Flexible working hours
  • Paid one month vacation per year and sick leaves
  • Medical insurance (according to the company policy)
  • Days off on national holidays
  • English educational programs (Lingua-Leo online course & Speaking Club);
  • individual coach sessions;
  • ability to study and attend seminars and training according to the request;
  • co-working and gym/sports compensations (according to the company policy);
  • the opportunity to receive a reward for the most innovative idea that the company can patent.

Let’s make it a win-win for you and CloudLinux. Do not put off until later -- apply today and our team will gladly welcome you.

By applying for this position, you agree with Cloudlinux Privacy Policy and give us your consent to maintain and process your personal data with this respect. Please read our Privacy Policy for more information.
